extension.description:
Simple Joomla JostPay Donation Plugin

Thank you for installing Simple Joomla JostPay Donation Plugin. This module is a customizable plugin to enable JostPay Payment method on your Joomla content. The following features are available:

  • Allow you to enter your merchant-id
  • Allow you to enter your store-id
  • Return address (URL) when payment is complete
  • To view the buy now button on your article add this TAG to your content {wpjostpaydonation}{/wpjostpaydonation}

    • Visit https://jostpay.com for details.



    Thanks!
    JostPay Donation plugin for Joomla by JostPay
